Imbiber.name: Imbiber
Imbiber.description: For every 5 Willpower purchased within range, you deal +{value}% increased damage while Healthy.

Territorial.description: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal +{value}% increased damage to Close targets.

Exploit.description: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal +{value}% increased damage to Vulnerable targets.
Exploit.additionalBonusDescription: When an enemy is damaged by you, they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds. This cannot happen more than once every 20 seconds per enemy.

Ambidextrous.description: Grants +{value}% bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
Ambidextrous.additionalBonusDescription: You deal x8% increased damage while wielding One-Handed weapons.
